directions: In a large saucepan, bring to a boil the tomatoes, onions, peaches, pears, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, sugar, vinegar and salt. Reduce heat. Place the pickling spice into the mixture. Stirring frequently, simmer 1 1/2 hours, or until volume is reduced by half.
Discard spice bag. Transfer the mixture to sterile containers. Store in the refrigerator until use.
ingredients: 5 fresh peaches - peeled, pitted and chopped
4 tablespoons pickling spice, wrapped in cheesecloth
title: Peach Salsa
